WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHornBell_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="01caa94ca9b5458eb254fb043a5d9a0b" Scale="0.9476031"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Talvez possa alcançá-lo [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]lançando [System:Color name="Default"]um Pikmin...

WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHimeFork_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="390e4b7f7bfa4c72bc897ced66017260" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Isso precisa ser levado para a S.S. Beagle.
